bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XX (Nos 2245-2287)

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Lobel E., E.P. Wegener and C.H. Roberts, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Part XX (Nos 2245-2287). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1952, 8°, xvi-192 pp. et XVI pll.

C.R. par André Bataille, REG 67 (1954) pp. 313-315. - Pierre Chantraine, RPhil 3e s., 28 (1954) pp. 87-88. - John A. Davison, JHS 74 (1954) pp. 540-541. - Marcel Hombert, AntCl 23 (1954) pp. 540-541. - Rudolf Keydell, Prolegomena 2 (1953) pp. 133-136. - Roger A. Pack and Orsamus Pearl, CP 50 (1955) pp. 211-213. - Dino Pieraccioni, Maia 5 (1952) pp. 288-295. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 29 (1954) No. 57, pp. 147-150. - Bruno Snell, Gnomon 25 (1953) pp. 433-440. - Eric G. Turner, CR N.S., 4 (1954) pp. 20-24. - Edoardo Volterra, Iura 3 (1952) pp. 384-386. - Hans Julius Wolff, ZSav 71 (1954) pp. 390-398.
